name: Elise
description:
This project was one of my pieces of coursework in 2019, around may. It was done in unity.
I have done the everything (Meaning code, level design, story), except the art and music assets. All the credits belong to their respective owners.

The plot of this game revolves around the character named Dimitri, which is searching for his missing daughter, Elise. There are 3 types of enemies: the rats, the wolves and the monster. The player can acquire a melee weapon (axe), and he can ride a horse.

Controls:

Movement________WASD
Run____________Left Shift
Attack__________Left Mouse Button (Hold)
Mount__________P
Dismount________O
Roll____________Left CTRL
Change Weapon___Tab
